001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.IDPSegmentResponse;
009
010/**
011 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetIDPSegmentResponse}, opCode 66, size 2
012 *
013 * <br>
014 *
015 * 
016 * <table border='1'>
017 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
018 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>66</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
019 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>2</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
020 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
021 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetIDPSegmentResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
022 * </table>
023 */
024@MessageProps(
025    opCode=66,
026    size=2,
027    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
028    response=IDPSegmentResponse.class
029)
030public class IDPSegmentRequest extends Message { 
031    private int idpId;
032    private int segmentIndex;
033    
034    public IDPSegmentRequest() {}
035
036    public IDPSegmentRequest(int idpId, int segmentIndex) {
037        this.cargo = buildCargo(idpId, segmentIndex);
038        this.idpId = idpId;
039        this.segmentIndex = segmentIndex;
040        
041    }
042
043    /**
044     * <table border="1">
045     * <caption>Parsed fields for IDPSegmentRequest:</caption>
046     * <tr><td><code>idpId</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
047     * <tr><td><code>segmentIndex</code></td><td><code>raw[1]</code></td></tr>
048     * </table>
049     */
050    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
051        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
052        this.cargo = raw;
053        this.idpId = raw[0];
054        this.segmentIndex = raw[1];
055        
056    }
057
058    
059    /**
060     * <table border="1">
061     * <caption>Byte layout for IDPSegmentRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
062     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
063     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>(byte) idpId</code></td></tr>
064     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>(byte) segmentIndex</code></td></tr>
065     * </table>
066     */
067    public static byte[] buildCargo(int idpId, int segmentIndex) {
068        return Bytes.combine(
069            new byte[]{ (byte) idpId },
070            new byte[]{ (byte) segmentIndex }
071        );
072    }
073    public int getIdpId() {
074        return idpId;
075    }
076    public int getSegmentIndex() {
077        return segmentIndex;
078    }
079    
080    
081}
